详情: Ready for Anything: Weather whatever comes your way while wearing our Boot Cut Cargo Pants, which feature rugged ripstop fabric, triple-stitched outseams, tradesman cargo pocket and a soft interior
8 Pockets and Elastic Waist with Zipper Fly: These bottoms have enough pockets to store your phone, pen, notepad and other work essentials, plus a utility loop to keep your ID badge easily accessible
Outwork Them All: The Ripstop collection features a strong yet cozy polyester and cotton blend that won’t rip, shrink or lose shape, as well as a wide range of colors to match your department
Designed for Strength and Perseverance: Designed for the tireless nurses and doctors that help us stay healthy, Carhartt scrubs provide comfort and durability throughout long shifts
Hardworking Gear for Hardworking People: We stand behind the quality, craftsmanship and performance of every workwear product we make, because we are worn by the hardest-working people of all
